original_text: The people were waiting expectantly and were all wondering in their hearts if John might possibly be the Messiah.
korean_text: 백성들이 바라고 기다리므로 모든 사람들이 요한을 혹 그리스도신가 심중에 생각하니

sentences.original_text: and were all wondering in their hearts
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 모두 마음속으로 의아하게 여기고 있었다

sentences.original_text: if John might possibly be the Messiah
